author: mguilbau
body:
This is the PR to merge my branch.

This change include the new tower counting algo at Stage-2 layer 2 level. It implies:
- Creating a new sum type
- Implementing the tower counting algo at Layer2 level and send out the result
- Collect the new sum at Demux, sum positive and negative eta side tower and record
title: Integrating tower algorithm in Stage-2
